totalData.content:
Empowering Small Businesses with AI and Smart AutomationFrom web design to AI implementation Book free consultationContact UsWeb DesignWeb DevelopmentMVP DevelopmentMobile AppsAI AssistantsProcess AutomationLoading animated content...Empowering Small Businesses About HiQSenseAt HiQSense, we empower small and medium-sized businesses with advanced, AI-driven automation designed to simplify operations, reduce costs, and accelerate growth. Our mission is to transform how businesses operate by eliminating technical barriers and providing seamless access to intelligent systems that handle everyday tasks. The name HiQSense reflects our vision and values: “Hi” stands for high standards; “Q” represents both IQ (intelligence) and Quality; and “Sense” highlights our belief in AI systems that continue to evolve—developing perceptive, context-aware capabilities that emulate human senses. As technology advances, so will our systems—growing smarter, more intuitive, and more valuable to the businesses we serve. Proudly based in Saskatchewan, Canada, we are committed to supporting local entrepreneurs and contributing to the province’s growing innovation economy. As a Canadian company, we aim to lead in responsible AI adoption—creating tools that are not only effective and scalable but also built with integrity, inclusivity, and a deep understanding of the challenges faced by businesses across the country.Book free consultationIntroducing Saski AI — Our Flagship PlatformSaski AI is a no-code platform that empowers small and medium-sized businesses to automate customer support across SMS, WhatsApp, voice, social media, and websites. By enabling users to build AI assistants in under 10 minutes—without any technical skills—Saski AI helps businesses reduce operational costs, respond instantly to inquiries, and deliver consistent, multilingual service.Visit Saski AIFrequently Asked Questions Schedule a Call with HiQSense

About UsHiQSense is a Canadian technology company based in Saskatchewan. Our mission is to empower small businesses by making AI accessible, useful, and easy to implement.​About HiQSense Our Vision We envision a future where small businesses can harness the power of AI to operate efficiently, reduce costs, and grow sustainably—without needing technical expertise. At HiQSense, we’re committed to building smart, accessible tools that simplify complex tasks. Through innovations like Saski AI, we empower business owners to automate customer support, streamline operations, and focus on what truly matters—their customers and their growth. Our Values Accessibility – We make advanced AI simple and usable for everyone. Empowerment – We enable businesses to automate and grow on their own terms. Innovation – We continuously explore new ways to solve real-world problems. Simplicity – We design intuitive tools that work without complexity. Customer-Centricity – We listen closely and build solutions around real needs. Reliability – We deliver stable, dependable technology you can trust. Book free consultationOur TeamAt the heart of HiQSense is a multidisciplinary team of passionate innovators and builders.Azar ObeidatCo-Founder & CEO Drives HiQSense forward with a vision to make advanced AI accessible and impactful for small businesses. Crafts intuitive interfaces with a focus on user experienceMarwan KhanfarCTO & Co-FounderLeads technology innovation at HiQSense Crafts intuitive interfaces with a focus on user experienceMohammad MelhemCo-Founder - Business Development & StrategiesDrives strategic growth with deep market insight and relentless focus on impact. Schedule a Call with HiQSense

HomeAbout UsFAQContactBook free consultation Terms of Service Effective Date: March 28, 2025 This Terms of Service agreement ("Agreement") is entered into by and between HiQSense Smart Systems LTD ("HiQSense", "we", "us", or "our"), a Canadian-registered corporation, and any person or entity ("you" or "your") accessing or using our website, digital products, or custom software and automation services. By accessing our website or engaging our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of our website and services. 1. Use of Services Our services are intended for lawful business use. You agree not to use our website, platforms, or delivered systems for any unlawful activity or to violate any local, provincial, national, or international regulations. 2. Project Engagement and Scope All services begin with a discovery or consultation phase. Based on your business needs, we prepare a custom scope of work and formal quote. No project will commence until both parties agree in writing to the proposal, deliverables, and payment structure. 3. Pricing and Payment Terms HiQSense does not offer flat-rate pricing. All costs are project-specific and depend on the scope, complexity, and duration of the engagement. Payment terms, including deposits, installment schedules, and final payments, will be detailed in the proposal or service agreement. Late payments may delay delivery or incur additional charges. 4. Ownership and Licensing Unless otherwise agreed in writing, all custom-built code, workflows, or software solutions developed under a paid contract become the property of the client upon final payment. HiQSense retains the right to reuse general frameworks or non-client-specific utilities developed independently. 5. Confidentiality We maintain strict confidentiality over all materials, communications, and proprietary business or technical information shared with us. We will not disclose your data, ideas, designs, or internal systems to any third party without prior consent. 6. Hosting and Maintenance Hosting, updates, and technical support are not included by default. These services may be added under an Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC), which covers hosting management, software updates, minor modifications, and troubleshooting. 7. Limitations of Liability HiQSense makes every effort to build secure, reliable systems. However, we do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation and are not liable for losses resulting from downtime, third-party service interruptions, or client-side misuse. Our liability is limited to the total fees paid under the specific service agreement. 8. Termination Either party may terminate an agreement with written notice. In the event of early termination by the client, any work completed to date will be invoiced and due. HiQSense reserves the right to suspend service or access in case of non-payment or violation of these terms. 9. Governing Law This Agreement is governed by the laws of the Province of Saskatchewan and applicable federal laws of Canada. Any disputes arising out of this Agreement shall be resolved through mediation or the courts of Saskatchewan. 10. Contact If you have questions about these terms, please contact us:HiQSense Smart Systems LTD400 – 111 2nd Ave S, Saskatoon, SK, S7K 1K6Email: info@hiqsense.caPhone: +1 306 261 8582 Schedule a Call with HiQSense info@hiqsense.ca+1 306 261 8582400-111 2nd Ave S, Saskatoon , SK CA, S7K 1K6Legal PagesPrivacy PolicyTerms of ServiceMain PagesHomeAbout UsFAQContact©2025 All rights reserved for HiQSense Smart Systems LTD

HomeAbout UsFAQContactBook free consultation Privacy Policy Effective Date: March 28, 2025 HiQSense Smart Systems LTD ("HiQSense", "we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website or services. 1. Information We Collect Personal Information: When you fill out forms, book consultations, or work with us, we may collect your name, email, phone number, and relevant business information. Technical Information: We may collect anonymized data such as IP address, browser type, device type, and browsing behavior using analytics tools like Google Analytics or Hotjar to improve user experience. Project Files & Data: If you provide documents, designs, APIs, databases, or content to complete your project, this information is treated as strictly confidential and is used only for the purpose of delivering the contracted services. 2. How We Use Your Information To communicate with you regarding your inquiry, consultation, or project To assess and deliver the services you request To improve our website and service offerings To manage billing and client accounts To comply with legal and regulatory obligations 3. Sharing of Information We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with trusted partners only when necessary to operate our business—such as hosting providers (AWS, GCP, Heroku), payment processors (Stripe), or communication tools (Twilio, Calendly). These partners are required to protect your data in accordance with their own privacy policies and data protection laws. 4. Data Security We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. This includes secure storage, access control, encryption, and regular security audits. 5. Data Retention We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide services and as required by law. You may request deletion of your personal data or project files at any time, unless retention is required for legal or operational reasons. 6. Your Rights You have the right to request access to your personal data, correct inaccuracies, or ask us to delete your information. To make such a request, please contact us using the details below. 7. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our practices or legal obligations. Updates will be posted on this page with the revised effective date. 8. Contact If you have any questions or concerns about this policy, please contact us: HiQSense Smart Systems LTD 400 – 111 2nd Ave S, Saskatoon, SK, S7K 1K6 Email: info@hiqsense.ca Phone: +1 306 261 8582 Schedule a Call with HiQSense info@hiqsense.ca+1 306 261 8582400-111 2nd Ave S, Saskatoon , SK CA, S7K 1K6Legal PagesPrivacy PolicyTerms of ServiceMain PagesHomeAbout UsFAQContact©2025 All rights reserved for HiQSense Smart Systems LTD

This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website or services. 1. Information We Collect Personal Information: When you fill out forms, book consultations, or work with us, we may collect your name, email, phone number, and relevant business information. Technical Information: We may collect anonymized data such as IP address, browser type, device type, and browsing behavior using analytics tools like Google Analytics or Hotjar to improve user experience. Project Files & Data: If you provide documents, designs, APIs, databases, or content to complete your project, this information is treated as strictly confidential and is used only for the purpose of delivering the contracted services. 2. How We Use Your Information To communicate with you regarding your inquiry, consultation, or project To assess and deliver the services you request To improve our website and service offerings To manage billing and client accounts To comply with legal and regulatory obligations 3. Sharing of Information We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with trusted partners only when necessary to operate our business—such as hosting providers (AWS, GCP, Heroku), payment processors (Stripe), or communication tools (Twilio, Calendly). These partners are required to protect your data in accordance with their own privacy policies and data protection laws. 4. Data Security We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. This includes secure storage, access control, encryption, and regular security audits. 5. Data Retention We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide services and as required by law. You may request deletion of your personal data or project files at any time, unless retention is required for legal or operational reasons. 6. Your Rights You have the right to request access to your personal data, correct inaccuracies, or ask us to delete your information. To make such a request, please contact us using the details below. 7. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our practices or legal obligations. Updates will be posted on this page with the revised effective date. 8.
